description.en: CAT Fusion is the first Telegram-based hyper-casual game on the Nervos Network (CKB), a Bitcoin Layer 2 blockchain, designed to provide players with rewarding and interactive experiences. Players can battle bosses, upgrade their cat-themed digital assets, and compete on leaderboards to earn rewards, potentially in CKB tokens or NFT form. Built on CKB's secure Layer 1 and UTXO-based Cell model, CAT Fusion leverages the RGB++ protocol to manage in-game assets, ensuring secure and trustless transactions.
description.ch: CAT Fusion 是 Nervos 网络 (CKB) 上第一个基于 Telegram 的超休闲游戏，CKB 是比特币二层区块链，旨在为玩家提供有奖励性和互动性的体验。玩家可以与 boss 战斗，升级他们的猫主题数字资产，并在排行榜上竞争以获得奖励，可能是 CKB 代币或 NFT 形式。基于 CKB 安全的第一层和基于 UTXO 的 Cell 模型构建，CAT Fusion 利用 RGB++ 协议管理游戏内资产，确保安全和无信任交易。

title.ch: 首个 Telegram 超休闲游戏

description.en: Pioneers blockchain gaming on CKB as the first Telegram-based hyper-casual game, offering accessible and engaging gameplay via a popular messaging platform
description.ch: 作为首个基于 Telegram 的超休闲游戏，在 CKB 上开创区块链游戏先河，通过流行的消息平台提供易于访问和引人入胜的游戏体验

description.en: Received funding from the CKB Eco Fund to support community growth, partnerships, airdrops, and the official beta launch, boosting ecosystem integration
description.ch: 获得 CKB 生态基金资助，支持社区发展、合作伙伴关系、空投和官方测试版发布，促进生态系统整合

a.en: CAT Fusion is a Telegram-based hyper-casual game where players engage in boss battles, upgrade their cat-themed digital assets (e.g., NFTs representing unique cats), and compete on leaderboards to earn rewards such as CKB tokens or exclusive in-game items. Players can enhance their cats' abilities, participate in time-based challenges, and trade assets within the Nervos ecosystem, leveraging the RGB++ protocol for secure transactions.
a.ch: CAT Fusion 是一个基于 Telegram 的超休闲游戏，玩家可以参与 boss 战斗，升级他们的猫主题数字资产 (如代表独特猫咪的 NFT)，并在排行榜上竞争以获得 CKB 代币或独家游戏内物品等奖励。玩家可以增强他们猫咪的能力，参与基于时间的挑战，并在 Nervos 生态系统内交易资产，利用 RGB++ 协议进行安全交易。

q.en: Does it support UTXO Global Telegram wallet?
q.ch: 它支持 UTXO Global Telegram 钱包吗？

a.en: Yes, CAT Fusion is likely to support integration with the UTXO Global Telegram wallet, given its role as a leading wallet interface in the Nervos ecosystem. This allows players to manage their in-game assets (e.g., cat NFTs and CKB rewards) seamlessly within Telegram, utilizing UTXO Global's features like RGB++ asset management and cross-platform synchronization for a streamlined gaming experience.
a.ch: 是的，考虑到 UTXO Global 在 Nervos 生态系统中作为领先钱包界面的作用，CAT Fusion 很可能支持与 UTXO Global Telegram 钱包的集成。这允许玩家在 Telegram 内无缝管理他们的游戏内资产 (如猫咪 NFT 和 CKB 奖励)，利用 UTXO Global 的功能，如 RGB++ 资产管理和跨平台同步，提供流畅的游戏体验。
